ALIENRPG.NoActor: You can only create macro buttons for owned Items

ALIENRPG.StylePickerHint: Select the font you want to use for all text
ALIENRPG.MenuName: Alien RPG Colour and Font Settings

ALIENRPG.AddMenuHint: Add Colour and Font setting button to Main Config panel.
ALIENRPG.InThePipe: 'We’re in the pipe; five by five.'
ALIENRPG.ResetNote: NOTE: Save and Reset will cause FVTT to reload.
ALIENRPG.DefProtoHint: Automatically set advised prototype token settings to newly created Actors.
ALIENRPG.DefMacroHint: Enable a shortened macro syntax which allows referencing attributes directly, for example @str instead of @attributes.str.value. Disable this setting if you need the ability to reference the full attribute model, for example @attributes.str.label.
ALIENRPG.PermanantTrauma: Permanent Trauma. Make an EMPATHY roll at the end of the session.
ALIENRPG.Seepage106: See page 105 of the Alien rule book.
ALIENRPG.CreatureSkill: This Creature does not have this Skill.
ALIENRPG.AcidBlood: This Creature does not have Acid Blood
ALIENRPG.DialTextXeno: Please enter the damage inflicted on the Xeno.
ALIENRPG.Panic1: KEEPING IT TOGETHER: You manage to keep your nerves in check. Barely. Your skill test is unaffected.
ALIENRPG.Panic7: NERVOUS TWITCH: You and all PCs in the area gain +1 Stress. Your current skill test is unaffected.
ALIENRPG.Panic8: TREMBLE: MOBILITY rolls suffer -2 dice until your panic stops. Your current skill test is unaffected.
ALIENRPG.Panic9: DROP ITEM: You drop a weapon or other important item and you gain +1 Stress. Your skill test is unaffected, unless it involves the item you dropped.
ALIENRPG.Panic10: FREEZE: You freeze in fear for a short period of time. You and all friendly PCs around you gain +1 Stress. Your skill test fails, even if you rolled any 6s.
ALIENRPG.Panic11: SEEK COVER: Use your next action to move away from the source of danger and seek the closest safe place to hide. Regain 1 Stress, but all friendly PCs who can see or hear you run away lose 1 Stress. Your current skill test is unaffected.
ALIENRPG.Panic12: SCREAM: You start screaming for your action. Regain 1 Stress, but all friendly PCs who can hear you lose 1 Stress. Your skill test fails, even if you rolled any 6s.
ALIENRPG.Panic13: FLEE: Use your next action to get as far away from the source of danger as possible. You can’t attack anyone or make any actions which don’t immediately aid your escape. Regain 1 Stress, but all friendly PCs who can see or hear you run away lose 1 Stress. Your skill test fails, even if you rolled any 6s. Add 1 point to your Disorder track and roll on it once you are in a safe place.
ALIENRPG.Panic14: BERSERK: Immediately attack the nearest person or creature on your next turn, even if they are friendly. Your attack continues until either you or your target is Downed. All friendly PCs who witness your rampage must make an immediate panic roll. Your skill test fails, even if you rolled any 6s. Add 1 point to your Disorder track and roll on it once you calm down.
ALIENRPG.Panic15: CATATONIC: Collapse to the ground in complete and utter helplessness, unable to move or speak and staring into space. Your skill test fails, even if you rolled any 6s. Add 1 point to your Disorder track and roll on it immediately.
ALIENRPG.SynthDontNeed: Synthetics don’t need air, food, water, or sleep. They are immune to vacuum, cold, and disease. Androids are typically unaffected by alien pathogens.
ALIENRPG.Seepage104: See page 104 of the Alien rule book.
ALIENRPG.PCPanicLevel: PC's Panic level has increased by one step to
ALIENRPG.YourPanicLevel: Your Panic level has increased by one step to
ALIENRPG.NoSynCrit: No Critical Injuries on Synthetics table
ALIENRPG.hideInitChatHint: Check this to hide chat messages for Initiative rolls
ALIENRPG.NotifWrongItemType: "{type}" items cannot be added to a {actor}!
ALIENRPG.hideJournalBGImageNote: Hide the Background Image on Journal Entries
ALIENRPG.hideChatBGImageNote: Check this to hide the facehugger background image in chat.
ALIENRPG.NOTABLES: There are no tables to draw from!
